00012 @require_once('config.inc.php');
00013 require_once('html.inc.php');
00014 require_once('html_parse.inc.php');
00015 require_once('modules.inc.php');
00016 // module glue gets loaded on demand
00017 
00018 
00019 // module_image.inc.php has more information on what's going on inside modules 
00020 // (they can be easier than that one though)
00021 
00022 
00023 function anchor_alter_render_early($args)
00024 {
00025         $elem = &$args['elem'];
00026         $obj = $args['obj'];
00027         if (!elem_has_class($elem, 'anchor')) {
00028                 return false;
00029         }
00030         
00031         if (!empty($obj['anchor-name'])) {
00032                 // use a div with attribute id instead of the deprecated name attribute 
00033                 // of a
00034                 $d = elem('div');
00035                 elem_attr($d, 'id', $obj['anchor-name']);
00036                 if ($args['edit']) {
00037                         elem_add_class($d, 'glue-anchor-name');
00038                         elem_add_class($d, 'glue-ui');
00039                         elem_val($d, htmlspecialchars('#'.$obj['anchor-name'], ENT_NOQUOTES, 'UTF-8'));
00040                         elem_attr($elem, 'title', 'this is a named anchor, regular visitors won\'t be seing this icon');
00041                 } else {
00042                         elem_val($d, '&nbsp;');
00043                 }
00044                 elem_append($elem, $d);
00045         }
00046         
00047         return true;
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 function anchor_alter_save($args)
00052 {
00053         $elem = $args['elem'];
00054         $obj = &$args['obj'];
00055         if (!elem_has_class($elem, 'anchor')) {
00056                 return false;
00057         }
00058         
00059         unset($obj['anchor-name']);
00060         $childs = html_parse(elem_val($elem));
00061         foreach ($childs as $child) {
00062                 if (elem_has_class($child, 'glue-anchor-name')) {
00063                         $obj['anchor-name'] = elem_attr($child, 'id');
00064                         break;
00065                 }
00066         }
00067         
00068         return true;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 function anchor_render_object($args)
00073 {
00074         $obj = $args['obj'];
00075         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'anchor') {
00076                 return false;
00077         }
00078         
00079         $e = elem('div');
00080         elem_attr($e, 'id', $obj['name']);
00081         elem_add_class($e, 'anchor');
00082         elem_add_class($e, 'object');
00083         
00084         invoke_hook_first('alter_render_early', 'anchor', array('obj'=>$obj, 'elem'=>&$e, 'edit'=>$args['edit']));
00085         $html = elem_finalize($e);
00086         invoke_hook_last('alter_render_late', 'anchor', array('obj'=>$obj, 'html'=>&$html, 'elem'=>$e, 'edit'=>$args['edit']));
00087         
00088         return $html;
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 function anchor_render_page_early($args)
00093 {
00094         if ($args['edit']) {
00095                 if (USE_MIN_FILES) {
00096                         html_add_js(base_url().'modules/anchor/anchor-edit.min.js');
00097                 } else {
00098                         html_add_js(base_url().'modules/anchor/anchor-edit.js');
00099                 }
00100                 html_add_css(base_url().'modules/anchor/anchor-edit.css');
00101                 return true;
00102         } else {
00103                 return false;
00104         }
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 function anchor_save_state($args)
00109 {
00110         $elem = $args['elem'];
00111         $obj = $args['obj'];
00112         if (array_shift(elem_classes($elem)) != 'anchor') {
00113                 return false;
00114         }
00115         
00116         $obj['type'] = 'anchor';
00117         $obj['module'] = 'anchor';
00118         
00119         invoke_hook('alter_save', array('obj'=>&$obj, 'elem'=>$elem));
00120         
00121         load_modules('glue');
00122         $ret = save_object($obj);
00123         if ($ret['#error']) {
00124                 log_msg('error', 'anchor_save_state: save_object returned '.quot($ret['#data']));
00125                 return false;
00126         } else {
00127                 return true;
00128         }
00129 }
